scene1.text: Hi, welcome to Starbucks, how may I take your order?

scene2.text: Sure! Would you like green tea or black tea?

scene3.text: Sure! Would you like sugar or cream with your coffee?

scene4.text: Sure thing! That'll be $2.75. Will you be paying with card or cash today?
prompt1: I will be paying with card.
prompt2: I will be paying with cash.

scene5.text: Alright! You can tap when the machine is ready.
